name: @sap-bas/ai-code-assistant
description: AI code assistant helps developers by providing real-time code completion, code understanding and refactoring. AI code assistant supports a variety of developer tools, making it easy to use while coding.

scripts.install-core: cd core && npm install && npm link && cd -
scripts.install-vscode: cd extensions/vscode && npm install && npm link @continuedev/core && npm run package
scripts.install-and-package: npm run install-core && npm run install-vscode
scripts.install-vsix-for-linux: cd extensions/vscode && npm install && npm link @continuedev/core && npm run package-to-linux-x64-platform

author: SAP SE
